mosinstall.name: serrbizsefTags
mosinstall.author: Serr.Biz
mosinstall.description:
This module is designed to work only with SerrBizSEF. Its function is to replace the default meta information with meta information created by SerrBizSEF this includes Page title, Description,Keywords, Robots tags. This module does not hack any files when replacing the meta information, hence your Joomla core files are safe.

Important: Please set this module to a position which is active on all pages of your site and then check the meta information of your pages.
